total_reads.description: Number of reads to generate per GENERATE_READS process.

num_files.description: Number of GENERATE_READS processes which generate a single FASTQ file.

small_files.description: Number of miniature text files to generate in MANY_SMALL_FILES process

read_length.description: Length of FASTQ reads to generate.

run.description: Selectively run a tool. If this option is enabled only tools with this name will be ran. Note: this may affect downstream tools.

skip.description: Selectively disable a tool. If this option is enabled a tool will be ignored. Note: this may affect downstream tools.

use_small_files.description: Add small files to downstream operations tests  (e.g. count, rename, compress).

use_fastq_files.description: Use FASTQ files for downstream operations tests  (e.g. count, rename, compress).
